_json.gridTitle: Lemon Grass and Mint Tea recipe
_json.description: Summer, winter or monsoon, this is one tea that is sure to pep you up even on the most trying days! The whiffs of lemongrass and mint that escape the kettle promise your taste buds an exciting time ahead, and you will surely not be let down by this spicy, milky tea, which is full of intense flavours and aromas. Make sure you have this refreshing Lemon Grass and Mint Tea fresh and hot, as reheating it will lead to a loss of flavour and sometimes even a little bitterness. The herby accents are...
